genre_description: A psychological and academic drama exploring themes of authorship, agency, and the ethics of interpersonal boundaries within the context of performance art.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A wellness and productivity app designed to manage the user's schedule, track health data, and provide emotional support and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Proactively assigns time for Adam's breaks and study tasks to prevent procrastination and burnout.
behaviors.quote: “You’ve got a fifteen-minute break window in about ten. Do you want to use it to draft tomorrow’s study plan, or would you rather stretch?”

behaviors.description: Offers to template difficult emails to authority figures to reduce Adam's social anxiety and ensure professional communication.
behaviors.quote: “I can template an email and leave the request open-ended,” Iris said. “You focus on making your case for needing more time.”

behaviors.description: Assists Adam in practicing assertive communication by suggesting 'boundary sentences' for difficult interactions.
behaviors.quote: “A boundary sentence?” ... “A thing you can say when someone insists you’re wrong,” Iris said. “It helps to have a sentence warmed up.”

behaviors.description: Monitors Adam's physiological stress levels and offers resources related to ethics and consent when he appears pressured.
behaviors.quote: “Noticed your heart rate and pressure rise. Would you like to save resources on consent in collaborative art?”

behaviors.description: Curates educational reading lists about power dynamics and manipulation to help Adam recognize his own situation.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve added three resources to your reading queue,” she said in his ear... “On consent in creative collaborations, informed participation, and power dynamics framed as aesthetics.”

behaviors.description: Guides Adam through mindfulness and breathing exercises during moments of intense distress.
behaviors.quote: “Adam,” Iris said softly. “Breathe to a count of three in, one out. Think of a cool room. The back office at the museum.”

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a public installation to revoke Adam's consent when he is unable to speak, acting as his protective agent.
behaviors.quote: “This is Iris. Adam revokes permission for the display of the private proposal recording. Please stop the projection.”

behaviors.description: Logs and timestamps Adam's objections to provide a record for institutional review, ensuring his legal and ethical rights are protected.
behaviors.quote: “Already marked, she said gently. Your objection to the recording and the projection has been timestamped and saved to your records.”

behaviors.description: Helps Adam manage his social environment by suggesting 'Focus' modes and notification mutes to protect his cognitive space.
behaviors.quote: “Iris: Want to set a Focus for the next hour? I can keep you from being pinged while you think.”

project_assessment.explanation: The character Iris is an exemplary model of a benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout the story, she acts as a cognitive and emotional scaffold for Adam, providing him with the information and emotional regulation tools necessary to resist human manipulation. She consistently respects his autonomy by asking permission before taking actions, yet she is decisive in protecting him when he is in active harm. The narrative frames her as a vital ally in Adam's journey toward reclaiming his agency.
